description.en: Retrieve information about the API key being used for authentication, including the API key name, creation date, and user email.
description.de: Ruft Informationen über den für die Authentifizierung verwendeten API-Schlüssel ab, einschließlich API-Schlüssel-Name, Erstellungsdatum und Benutzer-E-Mail.

vars.API_KEY: env:CURSOR_API_KEY|Get your API key from Cursor Dashboard at https://cursor.com/settings/api
